intro:
Try your luck and test your wits in this adventure of fortune!
Good luck abounds in Sugoroku New Year's Party!
description:
Collect lucky coins through festive New Year's games.
Bring in the most good fortune, and you'll be crowned Master of the New Year!

With a Joy-Con™ controller for each player, up to six players can join in the fun!

[Sugoroku Mode]
Collect coins and aim for victory!
The board is filled with festive New Year's events and special ema plaques that can change your fate!
There's always a chance for a last-minute comeback!

[Minigame Mode]
Enjoy a variety of New Year's-themed minigames!
Play 10 different games, including Fukuwarai and Mochi Pounding!

[Online Mode]
Compete in sugoroku and minigames with players from around the world!
Test your luck for the New Year and see how you fare!

<Skin Edit>
Freely customize your Character Piece used in Sugoroku Mode!
Create original pieces in festive New Year's attire!
